item.title: Protecting Cells of Spreadsheet that Users Copied from Your Google Drive to User's Google Drive using Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists This is the method for protecting cells of Spreadsheet that users copied from your Google Drive to user’s Google Drive using Google Apps Script. Situation: This method supposes the following situation. You want to make users copy a Spreadsheet on your Google Drive to user’s Google Drive. - Your Spreadsheet has several protected ranges. - Your Spreadsheet is shared with the user. - User doesn’t have own folder shared with you.
